titleStmt.title: The shepheards starre, or The ministers guide. By Richard Bayly late minister of Crawley in Sussex
titleStmt.author: Bayly, Richard, fl. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Iohn Rothwell at the Sun in S. Pauls-Church-yard,
